CustomField.description: The path to the SLDS Icon (Custom, Standard, or Utility) that appears at the top of a form in a route during the application process in Customer Portal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the path to an SLDS Icon (Custom, Standard, or Utility) starting after '...icons/'. For example, the account standard icon path would be 'standard-sprite/svg/symbols.svg#account'.
CustomField.label: Portal Icon Path
